name: OHYESLAND
description:
This is a fast-paced video game featuring amusement park theme!

Storyline: OHYESLAND is a cool theme park that everyone can enjoy themselves. but one day something terrible happened, the park almost being shut down.

Gameplay: Player controls the character YESMAN fighting the emerging bad guys, you have to fight enemies, save tourists in various levels, you are the hero who brings joy back to the amusement park!

There are three type of YESMAN you can play as. How to skilled control them to finish missions in the limited time is the spirit of the game.
